story_alola_01_02000/2401_1001_0300_10: I, Faba, promise to be at your service—
story_alola_01_02000/2401_1001_0600_10:
E-e-excuse me! I just remembered somewhere I
need to be, so I must be going immediately!
story_alola_01_02000/2401_1001_0800_10: Wh-who, you ask? The president, of course!
story_alola_01_02000/2401_1001_0900_10: You seem awfully flustered for that. Are you sure?
story_alola_01_02000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Please don’t make me, Branch Chief Faba, waste
my precious time!
story_alola_01_02000/2401_1001_1300_10:
Agreed. And considering we have a case of stolen
data on our hands...
story_alola_01_02000/2401_1001_1400_10:
it might be best to inform President Lusamine of
this—just in case.
